In the MATTER OF the Termination of the Parent-Child Relationship of G.M.: K.C. (Father), Appellant-Respondent,
v.
Indiana Department of Child Services, Appellee-Petitioner. Court of Appeals Case No. 35A04-1709-JT-2088 Court of Appeals of Indiana. Filed February 28, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

PYLE , J.

Affirmed.

KIRSCH, J., Concurs.

BAILEY, J., Concurs.
